column6: Now that the mysterious Vampire X has unleashed his vampire goons, they're out for the Avengers' blood.  But with the new Daredevil sporting fangs, it looks like even heroes are susceptible to the vampire bite.  With this type of enemy the Avengers need some serious back-up-and back-up with some specialized training in vampire annihilation. Did somebody say BLADE? Fan-favorites Mark Millar (KICK-ASS) and Steve Dillon (PUNISHERMAX) shock and awe in the next thrilling chapter of Ultimate Avengers! Parental Advisory ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Steve Dillon | penciller:Ed McGuinness | writer:Mark Millar
